---
title: "Understand half-sibling misspecification"
---

"Understand half-sibling misspecification" is a pdf vignette. At present, pkgdown (the R package used to create this website) does 
not support pdf vignettes; see 
[pkgdown issue 781](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/781). 
When Pv3Rs is on CRAN, this signpost will be replaced by a link to the pdf
vignette on CRAN. For the time being, please access "Understand half-sibling misspecification" by calling `vignette(topic = "half-siblings", package = "Pv3Rs")` in
R.
